item.title: My Khan Academy trig functions test
item.description: After months of hard work, finally I have 100% in the Khan Academy Trigonometry section. This was my last exam, which I had to take it several times before reaching the ace! With my new knowledge I’ll try to code a unit circle animation and publish it in a new post.
